# TBD Tracker Template

> Repeatable file template — copy into `docs/project/tbd-tracker.md` to stand up a tracker for open questions.

```
# Open Design Questions

## High Priority (Blocks Core Loops)

| ID      | Question                         | Blocker        | Owner | Target Date |
| ------- | -------------------------------- | -------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| TBD-001 | Example question                 | Feature X      | Name  | 2025-01-15  |

## Medium Priority

| ID      | Question                         | Blocker        | Owner | Target Date |
| ------- | -------------------------------- | -------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| TBD-010 | ...                              | ...            | ...   | ...         |

---

<a id="tbd-001"></a>
### TBD-001 – Example Question
- **Context:** Link to design/spec
- **Blocker:** Why unresolved
- **Dependencies:** Related systems
- **Next Step:** Action owners / meetings / research
```
